name: BlobQuest (russellp211)
description:
Play through elemental, physics-based puzzles as a cute little blob.  Unlock power-ups, collect coins, buy upgrades, and try to beat all 11 levels.

Recommended Browser: Chrome

Controls:
Move: arrow keys
Jump: X
Attack: C
Change Ability: Z
Pause: P

Controls can be changed via the pause menu
